item.description:
FRIDAY March 8 -Woody Allen's Play It Again Sam with
The Connecticut Theatre Group

Your Ticket includes the Connecticut Theatre Group FREE Wine and Cheese Pre-Party at 7:30pm, the Play It Again Sam show in the Connecticut Theatre Group Section at 8pm,
and Afterparty following the show

ALL CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP TICKET HOLDERS WILL BE EMAILED
PRE-PARTY AND AFTERPARTY INFO


Woody Allen's vastly entertaining play that inspired the famous film of the same name, Play It Again, Sam follows the life of Allan Felix, a recent divorc√© whose awkward interactions with women have forced him to rely on the advice of his hero, Humphrey Bogart.

In this unique comedy, worlds collide as Allan attempts to navigate the unfamiliar territory of falling in love. An incredibly joyful play that echoes Casablanca, Play It Again, Sam captures the heart and follows Allan on his quirky, fantastic journey.

"Hilarious. A cheerful romp. Not only are Mr. Allen's jokes and their follow ups, asides and twists audaciously brilliant, but he has a great sense of character."
- The New York Times

"A funny, likeable comedy that has a surprising amount of wistful appeal."
- New York Post

Advance Ticket Discount - only $25

Tickets are $32.50 at the show

Your Ticket includes the Connecticut Theatre Group Pre-Party and Afterparty

Join The Connecticut Theatre Group for a FREE Wine and Cheese Party before the show!

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit www.CTTheatre.org

Call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your tickets from The Connecticut Theatre Group at the FREE Wine and Cheese Pre-Party starting at 7:30pm, or at the ticket window after 8pm
